specialAnnouncement:
We won't be singing on **22nd February.** Several of the singers in Durham are going to the [Sheffield All-Day singing](https://sacredharp.uk/event/south-yorkshire-singing/) instead.



We'll sing again in Durham on **14th March.**
text: ***We sing every 2nd and 4th Saturday of the month from 2pm - 4pm*** at [***Antioch House, 66 Crossgate, Durham, DH1 4PR***](#venue).
